This torrent only plays video/audio for the first 28 minutes, then the video STOPS & only plays AUDIO for the remainder of the movie, the video is EXCELLENT for the first 28.3 minutes, I even downloaded TWICE!!!
There's nothing wrong with the move,just download KMPlayer or BSPlayer with the latest K-lite codec pack and you'll be fine.
